mapper.select: select bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt,rnum from (select bid,writer,title,content,writedate,cnt,rownum rnum from (select * from board order by bid desc)) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10

select bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt,rnum from (select bid,writer,title,content,writedate,cnt,rownum rnum from (select * from board where ${searchType} like '%'||#{key}||'%' order by bid desc)) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board where ${searchType} like '%'||#{key}||'%'

select bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt,rnum from (select bid,writer,title,content,writedate,cnt,rownum rnum from (select * from board where writer=#{writer} order by bid desc)) where rnum between #{page}*10-9 and #{page}*10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board where writer=#{writer}
mapper.insert:
select BOARD_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into board(bid, writer, title, content, writedate, cnt) values(#{bid},#{writer},#{title},#{content}, sysdate,0)
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where bid=#{bid}
update board set cnt = cnt+1 where bid = #{bid}
